description: This premier end unit at Aloha Estates sets the standard for location, layout, and future-ready living. Offering 3 beds, 4 baths, and a highly efficient design built to serve lifestyle and long-term security. Distinctively features 11-foot ceilings, built-in speakers, expansive windows, and a bright open-concept main level. Deluxe stainless-steel appliance package with gas stove, gas bbq hook-up and on-demand hot water enhances everyday comfort, while low strata fees reinforce enduring affordability. The entry-level flex space includes a full closet and 3pc bath, allowing a seamless conversion to a 4th bed if desired. Generous storage, side-by-side laundry, double garage with 220V charging, and a prime location near schools, parks, transit, shopping, Community Center and future skytrain.
